required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of HSK3486 in Patients With Impairment Renal Functions
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study Comparatively Evaluating the Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamics and Safety of Intravenous Administration of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion in Patients With Chronic Renal Impairment and Subjects With Normal Renal Functions

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd

collaborator.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University

brief_summary.textblock: A Clinical Study Comparatively Evaluating the Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamics and Safety of Intravenous Administration of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion in Patients with Chronic Renal Impairment and Subjects with Normal Renal Functions

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single-center, open-label, non-randomized, parallel-controlled Phase I clinical study carried out in subjects with varying degrees (mild or moderate) of renal impairment, and age-, weight-, and gender-matched subjects with normal renal functions.

primary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
primary_outcome.description: Cmax（a measure of the body's exposure to HSK3486）will be compared between normal renal function patients and mild or moderate chronic renal impairment patients .

primary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
primary_outcome.description: AUC（a measure of the body's exposure to HSK3486）will be compared between normal renal function patients and mild or moderate chronic renal impairment patients .

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -5 minutes before administration until 1 hours post administration on day 1
-5 minutes before administration until 1 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: blood pressure（systolic, diastolic and mean arterial pressure）
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the screening to 3 days post-dose

arm_group.description: Subjects with normal renal functions (eGFR: ≥ 90 mL/min/1.73 m^2)

intervention.description: HSK3486，Initially 0.4 mg/kg was administered as a 1 minute bolus, followed immediately by a constant infusion dose of 0.4 mg/kg/h administered as a 30 minute infusion via infusion pump.

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University
